alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 15 at 2:01AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain continues to be possible WHERE...all islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Tuesday IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause ponding on the roadways and rapidly rising streams throughout the territory. Be prepared for heavy rainfall, which may be slow moving. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The risk for landslides remains as grounds have been saturated from the previous heavy rainfall event. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 201 Vaveao Aso Gafua Ianuari 15 2024 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE ASO LUA... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa NOFOAGA...motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Lua AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai luga o auala tele. E tatau ona e fa`alogologo pea i tala o le tau ma nofo sauniuni mo ni lapata`iga o tafega ma lologa e tu`u atu. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O timuga mamafa ma le susu o le eleele ua si`isi`i ai le avanoa mo solo e tutupu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleele, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
